text: Allaha tomaderake pakara'o karena na tomadera anarthaka sapathera jan'ye; kintu pakara'o karena ai sapathera jan'ye ya tomara majabuta kare badha. Ata'eba, era kaphaphara e'i ye, dasajana daridrake khadya pradana karabe; madhyama srenira khadya ya tomara sbiya paribarake diye thaka. Athaba, taderake bastu pradana karabe athaba, ekajana kritadasa kimba dasi mukta kare dibe. Ye byakti samarthya rakhe na, se tina dina roya rakhabe. Eta kaphaphara tomadera sapathera, yakhana sapatha karabe. Tomara sbiya sapathasamuha raksa kara emanibhabe allaha tomadera jan'ya sbiya nirdesa barnana karena, yate tomara krtajnata sbikara kara.
